DOC.criteria: 1. age 1885 2. able give inform consent 3. ≥ 6 month post diagnosis unilateral cortical stroke 4. residual leg paresis . 1. chronic low back hip pain 2. substance abuse 3. head trauma last 6 month 4. neurodegenerative disorder 5. uncontrolled medical condition 6. condition knee extension contraction contraindicate 7. people unable follow multi step command . 8. people walk ≥ 10 ft without physical assistance . 9. history major psychiatric disorder 10. participant myocardial infarction last year 11. participant uncontrolled hypertension 12. participant unable contract knee muscle
